title: IceCubeGFUClusterAlerts
description: IceCube Gamma-ray Follow-Up (GFU) Neutrino Cluster Alerts

monitored_source_name.description: Principal name of monitored source in source-list

alternative_source_names.description: Array of other names associated with the monitored source

n_signal_events_best.description: Number of signal events in neutrino flare candidate fit by the likelihood maximization

gamma_best.description: Power-law spectral index for the energy distribution of the neutrino flare candidate fit the likelihood maximization

test_statistic.description: The test statistic generated by the likelihood maximization used to evaluate the FAR of the flare candidate

initial_event_time.description: Start time of the intial event that defines the best fit time window found by the flare candidate likelihood [ISO 8601]

time_window_duration.description: Duration of the best fit time window between initial event and triggering event [s]

good_detector_uptime.description: Amount of time [s] during the flare candidate time window where detector was operating and data was determined to be good quality
